sentences.en: After appendicitis operation, abdominal distension, how to do?
sentences.cn: 阑尾炎手术后, 腹胀, 怎么办?

sentences.en: Customer: My child needs medicine for diarrhea and abdominal distension.
sentences.cn: 顾客: 我想给我的孩子买治腹泻、腹胀的药.

sentences.en: Feeding too rapidly will cause abdominal distension and regurgitation.
sentences.cn: 喂得太快会引起腹胀和反流.

sentences.en: For indigestion, food retention and qi stagnation, diarrhea abdominal distension.
sentences.cn: 促进消化不良 、 食积气滞 、 腹泻、腹胀的康复.

sentences.en: Heat causes the distension of gases.
Hemorrhoid ( or pile ) : Mass formed by distension of the network of veins supplying the anal canal.
sentences.cn: 痔: 肛管黏膜下或齿状线以下的皮下静脉网扩张形成团块.

sentences.en: Is there a sense of distension and numbness?
sentences.cn: 你有胀和麻木的感觉 吗 ?

sentences.en: It's suitable for the patient with the symptoms of abdominal pain and distension.
sentences.cn: 适用于腹痛、腹胀的病人.

sentences.en: Ji Zhi for food , abdominal distension Wan Man - oh pain, indigestion Dengzheng.
sentences.cn: 用于饮食积滞, 脘腹胀哦满疼痛, 消化不良等症.

sentences.en: Patient: Yesterday I had much distension and today it is relieved after moving.
sentences.cn: 病人: 昨天感到有些腹胀,今天排便后就缓解了.

sentences.en: Peptic ulcer with possible perforation and haemorrhage, pancreatitis, distension, ulcerative oesophagitis, anorexia, taste perversion and diarrhoea.
sentences.cn: 消化性溃疡穿孔和出血的可能, 胰腺炎, 腹胀, 溃疡性食管, 食欲不振,腹泻, 口味反常.

sentences.en: Result The complications such as diarrhea, abdominal distension in serious group were higher than operation group.
sentences.cn: 重症组EN天数、腹泻 、 腹胀的发生率高于手术组.

sentences.en: The baby cannot consume enough milk to relieve the distension.
sentences.cn: 婴儿不能喝下足够的牛奶以减轻胀气.

sentences.en: The cases of abdominal distension and constipation were counted and analyzed by statistics method.
sentences.cn: 统计术后3d内 出现腹胀、便秘人数,统计学方法采用χ2检验.

sentences.en: The patient developed severe pain and distension.
sentences.cn: 患者遭受了剧烈疼痛和肿胀.

trans.tran_en: Distension is abnormal swelling in a person's or animal's body
